ygData.subject: RE: Pugius Dagger
ygData.msgSnippet: Several of you have the wrong info for the Puguis dagger. The Puguis Dagger is beyond a doubt: DAM 5 DLY 21. It is indeed dropped off a lesser blade fiend.
ygData.messageBody:
Several of you have the wrong info for the Puguis dagger.

The Puguis Dagger is beyond a doubt: DAM 5 DLY 21.

It is indeed dropped off a lesser blade fiend. The Blade Fiend spawns in
the room just inside the porch near the back left side of the House. I know
this because, I currently own two of these wonderfull daggers that I got
myself both times. Both times the Lesser blade fiend spawned in the same
spot. He is a rare spawn. I got one dagger when I was 20th level (over a
month ago) and another one just last night :))

I am currenly duel wielding the Dragoon Dirk in my primary hand and the
Puguis in my off hand. My second Puguis is in the bank :)

Clearing out the rumors :)

Sevin Tercet <Mischief>
23rd Level Human Bard
on Brell

-----Original Message-----
From: Ben Wilson [mailto:ruldaas@...]
Sent: Friday, October 15, 1999 3:06 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Pugius Dagger


From: "Ben Wilson" <ruldaas@...>

I acquired a Pugius dagger quite some time ago from a friendly bard for only

25pp. It's stats are 6dam 23 delay magic peircing. Its damage ratio is
just a little bit better than a Dragoon dirk but it doesn't have any stat
increases. What I'm curious to know is where can this weapon be found? It
looks just like a regular or a rusty dagger and mine is the only one I've
ever seen. I forgot to ask the bard I got it from where he got it...so any
help would be appreciated. I'm guessing that because it has the same
graphic as a regular or rusty many people overlook this fine weapon.



Ruldaas Riverdance

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
the subject lol.
